summary: This document is a servicing disclosure statement from Fifth Third Mortgage Co regarding mortgage loan applicants. It outlines the rights of applicants under the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act (RESPA) and informs them about the potential transfer of loan servicing.
keyFacts: The document is a servicing disclosure statement related to mortgage loans.
It informs applicants about their rights under the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act (RESPA).
The statement mentions that servicing of the loan may be transferred to a different servicer.
It specifies that the financial institution does not intend to sell, transfer, or assign the servicing of the loan.
